content.rendered:
H7 Special Adaptor – Volkswagen compatibility

OVERVIEW

H7 Globes come in a few different variations that can be found in certain makes and models. These bulb holders are placed in between the standard H7 collar and the base creating the required fitting for your vehicle.

COMPATIBILITY

Special adaptors are commonly found amognst most Volkswagen, BMW, Mercedes Benz, Kia & Hyundai models. Note that we also have H7-1, H7-3, H7-5 & H7-6 globe types as well that have the additional collars build into the unit.

COLLAR VARIATION

The holder variations between 2 seperate styles can sometimes be very minimal and hard to tell apart, please be as precise as poossible when matching up with your existing holder to insure an easy installation.

DETAILS

Special adaptor to suit the following models:
